评论详情: Love the thumb holes

This sweater is very light weight and soooo soft! The thumb doles are great!. I have long arms and usually the thumb holes aren't in the right place for me but this fits just right. The back is long enough if you want to wear leggings with it. Super happy with this!
Late Christmas present for myself. Everyone loved the color. Very soft.
I love the buttery touch of the sweater. It’s very comfortable and color fuchsia is gorgeous.

I seldom buy clothes online they never fit right or look like the top picture. This top was on sale so I figured I had little to lose. I actually love it and I have bought two more in different colors! Very soft and warm (in CA weather), although the material is thin. The lenght is great, tunic style. I love the thumb holes in the sleeve cuffs. It has washed well in the washer and dryer with no special care. I bought large and I'm approximately 5'7" and weigh 155 lb. I would definitely recommend this top.

It was very thin.  It will be fine in fall and spring, but cold weather it's too thin.  I seems so so on quality.  It isn't bad.  This might sound funny but it had a slight mustard smell.  That will go away I'm sure.  I like the way it looks on me it isn't baggy.  When it's warmer I'll wear it.
Love how light and soft
Oversized and could size down if you want it more fitted.

Purchased for my daughter, who loves how soft it is! Thin enough that she can layer with a cardigan and doesn’t get uncomfortable. Has held up to multiple washes with no pilling. She has already asked for other colors.
Love thumb holes!
Haven’t worn yet because its material is too thin. Fit is ok
This shirt has good length in the arms for the thumb holes, so soft and comfortable to wear, great addition to my work wear.
This top is soft and comfortable and the fit is just right for me. Washed very well, too. Really love it.
Love the fit, style and material
Nice fit and I love the thumb holders because my hands are always cold. Bought these in 3 colors for me and more to give as gifts. They do run a bit big.
I love this shirt. It's so soft and the sleeves are long enough. Can wear with stretch pants
Soft, comfortable and warm. I absolutely love it. Great price too
This is my kind of shirt! It's soft and cozy, not clingy, but also not bulky. It's great with leggings, and the thumb holes are a bonus! I'm ordering 3 more!
Absolutely love this shirt. So cozy + and comfy! I got it a size bigger only bc I love it being looser. Great quality, super light weight.  Love it !
I love the fit and texture of this shirt. Several women at my work have shirts from this same material and they all love them as well.
Its so comfortable. It fits great 👍 very soft great material. Great price. Light weight easy to wash.

This shirt was delivered in a clear plastic package and left on my porch for all to see what’s inside and in the rain.  It’s a good thing I like this short otherwise u would return all 3. Hopefully, there is no damage to the shirts for being exposed.

评论概述: Super thin, definitely need to layer!
评论详情: Size reference 125 pounds, 5’5” and I got the medium The sleeves seem oddly long even though I have the cuffs rolled up one time. I ordered on the larger side so that I could layer underneath. A small would have fit if I didn't want to layer. It’s nice to have the option depending on the weather.
I absolutely love this sweater. It is not too heavy but still keeps you warm. I washed and dried it with no shrinkage. It fits true to size.
It is like pictured. It’s soft and warm. I love it.
The "green" is just gray. Pretty disappointed.

It's a pretty top but I wouldn't call it a fall top. It's much too thin a fabric to believe it's warm enough for fall chills. The only "fall" thing about it is the long sleeves. I do like it, however. It feels great and looks good. The color is very spot on as pictured. Really is a very nice top.

This shirt was so soft and fit perfect.  The shirt has a longer tail so when I wear it with a vest, it makes a statement.  The color was true to the picture and the quality was outstanding. Will buy the other colors if still available.  Highly recommend this product.
Could size down, very cute and soft
Cute super soft shirt, love the look and feel of the Hirt, thumb holes are a cute addition to it. Lightweight but warm.
The shirt itself is reallllly nice but the slits in the sides are cut too high to wear with nothing under neath

I ordered this shirt thinking meh, it's $8 can't say no and omg I'm glad I didn't say no. It is so soft, I threw a tank top under it but absolutely not needed. I've recently lost a lot of weight and am always worried about ordering online but I've been in XL so thatd what I ordered, it fits well will a little bit of extra room. I will definitely be ordering more.

评论概述: Super soft. Runs big due to stretching as you wear it.
评论详情: Nice shirt to dress up or down.
Very nice sweater
Love the color
This is very soft and comfortable. I ended up up buying another one.
Very soft, warm, true to size. Great with jeans.
Very soft fits great ! True to fit

It looks classy and much more expensive.  I tried it on and the fit was perfect - haven't worn it out yet, but it seems well made.  I hung it on a hanger and sprayed with "wrinkle releaser" (Downey, but any brand OK) to get the packing wrinkles out.  I got a size larger because I don't like tight sweaters.  I hangs down just right - not too big or too small.  Raglan sleeves are my favorite when mail ordering because with their lack of shoulder seams it's much easier to fit what ever "size" your shoulders are, and if you want tight or loose.  (For reference, got XL. I'm 5'10"; 145 lbs.)  It hangs down just past my butt.  The sleeves are 2" longer than my wrist, but easy to fold up or just push up.  Color is "Autumn Grey" and the picture showed almost black, but I was hoping it was dark gray - and it is.  It is scary ordering clothes after reading the reviews, but I lucked out this time.  If it snags or clings or crumbles in the wash, I will edit my review.  But now I love it.  Better than I even expected.
This is made of very thin and clingy material.  It runs small.  It shows every bulge.  I can wear it under a sweatshirt for a warmth layer, but I wouldn't wear it all by itself.

I hate long sleeves. There are very few shirts I have ever found that I can tolerate with sleeves. These are amazing! I got one and loved it so much I bought 3 more colors. They’re perfect to wear alone, or with a vest if it’s chilly out. 10 out of 10 recommend. Hopefully I feel the same after a few washes.
I really love this shirt!  Nice and soft. Not itchy. very nice fit for me.  Im 5'5 and 178lbs with a belly. I ordered the XL and fits very nice. I like the thumb holes as well.
Super soft and Comfortable

I bought two of these tops (one orange, one light green), just because I liked the look of them and the price was reasonable. I always read the reviews before purchasing something I can't see and touch for myself, and the reviews were very favorable. I have to say I am very pleased with both of them. The colors are pretty, the material is soft and flattering, though a little thinner than I expected, but the tops are roomy enough that I just wear a long-sleeved t-shirt underneath them if it's chilly out. I am planning on buying the caramel one next.

I totally love this thin knit top and was happy for the choices in stripe styles. I don’t think it is really see through but the quality is decent. I wouldn’t count on this as a winter warm sweater but I feel good wearing it under a denim jacket or a long cardigan. Size is great as I always order a size up to be safe.

This is a very soft, comfortable top.  I prefer a little longer sleeve and this sweater provides that.  It is a little thinner than I would like for warmth purposes, so 4 out of 5 stars.  I often wear a vest with it on cold days.
I ordered a Large and its true to fit. It fits me perfectly and it cover my booty!
Nice fit and it's dressy but not to dressy and it's light weight. I get to hot in most sweaters so this one was perfect
So soft and comfortable! Love the thumbholes!
It's soooo soft and very comfortable. It will be great for all seasons. I get sooo many compliments on it.
It is hard to see in this photo but the blue stripes are not solid. They almost look tie-dyed or blurry. I am returning. Wish I'd bought a solid because the sweater is so soft and comfy.
Love this light weight sweater. The thumb holes are well made and it fits well. True to size. On colder day I pair with a long sleeve shirt with button down. Super soft!  Will order more colors!!
Lg. Fits me good washes nice, it's soft.
Loved the comfort the cost was great,  very good,  got a lot of compliments

This tunic looks like it would be sweater material, but it’s not. It’s almost too thin to be tee shirt material. It’s not see through, but when not wearing it, you can see through it. Very soft though and I love the thumb holes!

I’m an odd size as I am tall and a little overweight. I’ve purchased clothes online before and thy never fit or they are not as described. These fit perfectly, are soft, lightweight and have been holding up to daily wear and weekly washing! I have plans to buy more!

I love the thumbholes in this shirt. It makes it so cozy. The material of this blouse is so soft and warm, it is perfect for cooler weather. It fits true to size and the tan is so pretty. Medium thickness is good on its own or layered. I love all the color options available.
Too short, Not a tunic and No thumb holes as pictured in the ad.  Very disappointing
This sweater is very roomy and the color is right on … I bought other colors as well to go with my jeans and boots.. long enough if you want to wear leggings..
This is soft, medium weight sweater that is perfect for work.  Best of all, the fabric does not cling to my "love handles".
I absolutely love this top! It is so comfy and the color is pretty. Not a fan of the thumb holes but I usually just fold the ends of the sleeves over. Great buy!
Quality is not good at all. Doesn't feel comfortable on the skin
Not a heavy sweater at all but easy to layer up. Size is true and long enough for leggings. 👍👌
Great product for price. Would buy again
Nice sweater. Cute, soft. Seems to be durable. Thinking I could have sized up, it’s a little tighter than I would have liked.

I ordered the pink/white stripes sweater. It’s so unbelievably soft, perfectly long, and quite flattering. I’m around 5’ 9” and about 140 pounds and I ordered a medium. I machine washed but hung it to dry and it held shape and softness wonderfully. I’ve since ordered 2 more while on sale and I’m so excited for them! It isn’t thin material or super thick, and I don’t find it necessary to wear an undershirt to hide my neutral-ish bra.

Super soft, love the long sleeves and thumb holes. Washed very well and still just as soft. Some say it's thin, this is a southern sweater, not for north winters. It's thin material but certainly not see through. I ordered medium. I'm 5'7" 135lb and it fit perfectly.
I really liked this shirt.... until I washed it.  It lost all it's softness and looked old very quickly.
Super comfortable, pretty color
This shirt is fuzzy! It's super soft, great color, extra long sleeves, thin and light weight, great night shirt.
The sweater is so soft washed well and great fit order another one

I love it fits great and very comfy and cozy
I am returning this shirt. The material is super thin and the blue one is lighter blue then the picture.

评论详情: Loved it. Fit great. True to size. Would get more colors

The material is soft, breathable, AND warm. The arm length and thumb hole placement is excellent! I prefer thumb holes, but often find they're cut too high on the sleeves. This shirt also looks good, is priced reasonably, and the ideal thickness so as to not be too heavy or too thin. I purchased blue and black shirts. The color did not fade when washed. The colors are rich, not dull.
Very comfortable and soft.  Love it.
I get so many compliments on this shirt, it is so soft and comfortable

I really do love this shirt. It is super soft and the sleeves are long enough for this tallish girl! 评论概述: immediately my fav shirt, tall ladies buy now!

I’m 12 weeks postpartum and wearing M/L right now (S/M pre-pregnancy); I got a medium but probably could have been fine with a small if I didn’t prefer a loose fit.

I initially only ordered 1, but when I got it, washed it, and wore it, it was so soft and comfortable that I ordered 3 more. Incredible shirt for low price!! I saved it for future purchases and hope they don’t stop making them!
I love this shirt. It's great quality and super soft. I wear it often. Bought some in other colors as well.
cozy
I really liked this sweater!  It fits true to size and it is so soft.  It’s green but to me is a green grey but love it.  Would recommend this sweater.

The fabric was interesting, even though it was unusual I kind of like the feel of it. But it really didn’t look very good on me so I returned it.
Great. Light weight. Would buy again.

The shirt is perfect. I love the material it is so soft and the perfect thickness for fall weather. It’s not real thin but not real thick either and if you like to wear with leggings this shirt is definitely long an enough. I also absolutely love the thumb holes!!!! A+++

评论概述: Great, cozy sweatshirt with thumb holes
评论详情: This is the perfect, beautiful and cozy sweatshirt for fall. I love the thumbholes and the dusky dark purple color. The fabric is cozy though seems like it could eventually pull or pill, so I'm going to be careful with it. It washed well on cold with hang dry. I love the thickness and style, and the small fit true-to-size. I definitely recommend this for a stroll in the fall leaves or grabbing a pumpkin spice latte.
True to size. Super comfortable.

Light weight, very soft sweater.  I’ll be purchasing other colors!
